fullText: While Carnelia brings fierce intelligence and unwavering commitment to her portrayal of Richards, the monodrama feels more like an earnest history lesson than compelling theater.
dtliExcerpt: While Carnelia brings fierce intelligence and unwavering commitment to her portrayal of Richards, the monodrama feels more like an earnest history lesson than compelling theater.
